message.body: Hey its the guy wh0 is intrsted in buying the usb turn table.. are yu avail n0w.. I can cum get it.. I live 64st in west als0..
0k k00l.. I shud be there in a half fr0m n0w...
Okay FYI it needs a needle but you can get one at the marvelous at 50th and Baltimore.
H0w much d0es needles c0st...and is that the 0nly thing it needs?
15 for a 2 pack on amazon. Not sure at marvelous probably more though. Only thing it needs
0h 0k.... well thanks anyway but I dnt need it
